metadata.title: CVE-2020-22219 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function bitwriter_grow_ in flac before1.4.0 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code via crafted input tothe encoder.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flac - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.2
libflac++6v5 - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.2
libflac8 - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flac package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-2ubuntu0.2').
